Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OSOM Influenza A&B Test, a lateral flow immunochromatographic assay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasal swab specimens in symptomatic patients to aid in rapid differential diagnosis of influenza A and/or B infections; negative results are presumptive and should be confirmed by cell culture.
